DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Intravenous Iron Sucrose Patients With Hip Fracture Prevent Perioperative Anemia
DOC.detailed_description: The main objective study evaluate safety efficacy intravenous iron sucrose patient hip fracture surgical intervention prevent perioperative anemia . It also determine whether intravenous iron sucrose administration improve outcome Haemoglobin value , transfusional need , postoperative complication , length hospital stay cost-effectiveness .
DOC.criteria: Age > = 65 year old With Hip fracture peritrochanteric fracture . Who need surgical intervention . And sign inform consent form . Tumor pathological fracture . Two long bone fracture . Seric Ferritin level > 300 ng/ml . Hypersensitivity Iron sucrose component formulation . Patients allogeneic transfusion rejection . Patients previous blood transfusion request ( Hb < 8g/dl ) . Patients treat hematopoietic growth factor . Patients Anticoagulant treatment , due thromboembolic high risk disease . Asthma treatment . Cirrhosis , Acute Hepatitis , increase Aminotransferases ( > 3 time upper limit normal ) . Advanced Dementia ( GDS > 5 ) Global Deterioration Scale .
